name: Ironman flies again
description:
In this game you navigate Ironman through space.

Controls

The controls are very easy. The only thing you have to now is that you fly with a and d or with touching the left or the right side of the screen.

Shop

That you can buy other skins in the shop, you need masks, that you can become in the space. When you have enough money you can click on the buy button und select the skin.

But now have a good time with this game.
